Movie: 5 - if you want an uproariously, (very) adult holiday flick, watch Ted Demme's 1994 "The Ref" with Judy Davis, Kevin Spacey and Dennis Leary.  You will have to stop the movie several times to recover from laughing.  (And watch out for that cat spray!)
